line_1: And wooes the Echo soft with murmurs melancholy.
line_2: The grimly wizard sees the spectres rise unholy;

line_1: In lays most musical and melancholy, —
line_2: Loathing this world and all its folly,
Haste, FANCY, from these scenes of folly
Shun, shun the "matron sage and holy,"
Thy humorous Vein, thy pleasing Folly
Or Whimsy with its Parent Folly;

line_1: To've thrown a shade of melancholy
line_2: Years seem to've shown her all her folly, —
